description:
We’re working with a Best in KLAS leading consulting firm who is seeking a full-time Senior Director of Business Development with proven experience partnering with healthcare organizations to accelerate their data innovation journey by leveraging analytics-AI solutions. This position is part of the senior leadership team responsible for growing this business by shaping the practice and product-service offerings, and creating deep, long-term engagement with client partners. This position offers an opportunity to work with some of the best delivery leaders in healthcare data and analytics-AI, and upon success would offer an opportunity to build and lead their own sales team.

$150-200k annual base DOE

Uncapped Commission/bonus

Remote w/Travel as needed (typically around 25-35%)

Requirements:
• Business development experience within the healthcare industry is required.
• Experience in healthcare analytics-AI consulting from a sales background.
• Understanding of how analytics-AI is leveraged in healthcare to drive value.
• Experience working with executive leadership in the business, clinical and technology (CEO, CFO, CMO, COO, CIO, CDAO, etc.).
• Background and knowledge of healthcare analytics-AI tools and technology – agile, data warehousing, big data, BI tools, data science and AI.
• Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to implement solutions
• Prior clinical experience a BIG plus.
